# calcite-radio-button-group

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                   | Type                                | Default        |
| ------------------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | -------------- |
| `disabled`          | `disabled` | Is the radio button group disabled                                                                            | `boolean`                           | `false`        |
| `layout`            | `layout`   | specify the layout direction of the radio button group, defaults to horizontal                                | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`        | `"horizontal"` |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`     | specify the name of the radio button group, required and must be unique to other radio button group instances | `string`                            | `undefined`    |
| `required`          | `required` | specify if this radio button group is required, defaults to false                                             | `boolean`                           | `false`        |
| `scale`             | `scale`    | specify the scale of the radio button group, defaults to m                                                    | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `"m"`          |
| `theme`             | `theme`    | specify the theme of the radio button group, defaults to light                                                | `"dark" \| "light"`                 | `"light"`      |
